description:
A violent thief who considers himself a superior rival to http://anidb.net/ch11900 [Nijuu-Mensou] and attacks him after Nijuu-Mensou rescues http://anidb.net/ch11899 [Chiko] from her family. He is armed with a set of sharp claws. Tora is motivated by greed and destruction.
Source: Wiki
name: Tora
